GQ7ContinuousBIT_GNSS_General

Continuous Built-In Test flags for general GNSS information

Bits 96-103 of the original 128 bit Continuous Built-In Test flags

Functions
GQ7ContinuousBIT_GNSS_General
GQ7ContinuousBIT_GNSS_General() = default
GQ7ContinuousBIT_GNSS_General
explicit GQ7ContinuousBIT_GNSS_General(
const uint8 bits
) : Bitfield(static_cast<uint64>(bits))
Parameters
bits
const uint8

Bits 96-103 of the original 128 bit Continuous Built-In Test flags

Constants
Bitmasks

Bitmasks for general GNSS flags

Note

These masks are shifted 96 bits to the right from the original 128 bitmask to have a 0 index at bit 96

CLOCK_FAULT

0x01 - The GNSS subsystem is not running off the system clock

HARDWARE_FAULT

0x02 - GNSS hardware initialization error

COMMUNICATION_ERROR_COMMS_SERIAL

0x04 - No communication on the COMMS Serial port

COMMUNICATION_ERROR_COMMS_SPI

0x08 - No communication on the COMMS SPI port

COMMUNICATION_ERROR_NAV_SPI

0x10 - No communication on the NAV SPI port

GPS_TIME_FAULT

0x20 - System GPS time is invalid

TIMING_OVERRUN

0x40 - GNSS processes are taking longer than their allotted time

Functions

Value of the general GNSS flags

bool clockFault() const

Gets the value of the GNSS Clock Fault bit (bit 96)

Returns
bool

true: The GNSS subsystem is not running off the system clock

Returns
bool

true: GNSS hardware initialization error

communicationError
uint8 communicationError() const

Gets the value of the GNSS Communication Error flags (bits 98-100)

Note

Bits 0-2 of this value correspond to bits 98-100

Returns
uint8

Value of the GNSS Communication Error flags

Returns
